hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik said:"The Messenger of Allah used to sacrifice two pronounce the name of Allah and say: 'Allah Akabar,' and I saw him slaughtering them with his own hand, and placing his foot on their sides "(Sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب تَسْمِيَةِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ عَلَى الضَّحِيَّةِ
chapter.eng-name: Saying The Name Of Allah, The Might And Sublime, Over The Sacrificial Animal
